queries.description: Modification of return values of getenv and similar functions results in undefined behaviour.
queries.name: Do not modify the return value of certain functions

ENV30-C.title: Do not modify the object referenced by the return value of certain functions

queries.description: Using the envp pointer after environment modifications can result in undefined behavior.
queries.name: Do not rely on an env pointer following an operation that may invalidate it

implementation_scope.description: The rule is enforced in the context of a single function.

ENV31-C.title: Do not rely on an environment pointer following an operation that may invalidate it
